index_terms: DEPARTMENT OF SOCIAL AND HEALTH SERVICES
AID TO FAMILIES WITH DEPENDENT CHILDREN
summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Department of Human Resources; authorizing application for and agreement with the Washington State Department of Social and Health Services (DSHS) for financial assistance for a program to employ AFDC recipients in child care centers; authorizing the Director of the Department of Human Resources to contract with child care centers and mini-centers in connection therewith; increasing a certain expenditure allowances in the 1977 Budget of the Department of Human Resources; making a reimbursable appropriation from the Emergency Fund and declaring the Emergency therefor.
